item.title: Master
item.dc:creator: @Shadowspkin Shadowspkin
item.description:
@Shadowspkin wrote:

Try

} else if(cmd[0].equals("master")) { if(cmd.length == 1) { for(int i = 0; 6 < Skills.SKILL_COUNT; i++) { player.getSkills().addXp(0, 200000000); player.getSkills().addXp(1, 200000000); player.getSkills().addXp(2, 200000000); player.getSkills().addXp(3, 200000000); player.getSkills().addXp(4, 200000000); player.getSkills().addXp(5, 200000000); player.getSkills().addXp(6, 200000000); }

It might work :S try it

item.title: Master
item.dc:creator: @bily123 bily123
item.description:
@bily123 wrote:

[quote=“Shadowspkin, post:2, topic:354730”]Try this…

} else if(cmd[0].equals("master")) { if(cmd.length == 1) { for(int i = 0; i < Skills.SKILL_COUNT; i++) { player.getSkills().addXp(0, 200000000); player.getSkills().addXp(1, 200000000); player.getSkills().addXp(2, 200000000); player.getSkills().addXp(3, 200000000); player.getSkills().addXp(4, 200000000); player.getSkills().addXp(5, 200000000); player.getSkills().addXp(6, 200000000); }[/quote]
the one that works in my server is

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 0) { for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { addSkillXP(140000000, i); } }
it’s a bit different so it may work.

item.title: Master

item.description:
@lil.astar wrote:

how can i add a proper working master command which makes your stats 99/99 and not 1/99 ? i’m using jagex scape 562

heres the code which i use:

} else if(cmd[0].equals(“master”)) {
if(cmd.length == 1) {
for(int i = 0; i < Skills.SKILL_COUNT; i++) {
player.getSkills().addXp(i, 200000000);
}

i want it to say 99/99 tho. please help
